name: Gas Diesel Inland Availability - Bhutan
description: Gas Diesel Inland Availability - Bhutan. The Energy Statistics Database provides a wide variety of data on multiple aspects of the numerous sources of energy. The data here covers the period from 1990 onwards. Data prior to 1990, would be available at http://unstats.un.org/unsd/energy/edbase.htm. For more information, please see http://unstats.un.org/unsd/energy/default.htm
